barker_notes.barker_summary: Bauzan to Austin, February 15, 1829. Receipt for cows.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 166

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Bauzan to Austin, February 15, 1829. Receipt for cows.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Recd of *person_mentioned*S F Austin */person_mentioned*three cows in payment of *person_mentioned*Mr. M. M. Battles*/person_mentioned* order for the Amount*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="02-15-1829">Febe 15 1829*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Bauzan*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
